sentences.en: "Mum thinks I should stop imposing on your hospitality, Leo," said Grace.
sentences.cn: “利奥，我妈妈觉得我不应该再在这儿麻烦你了，”格雷丝说。

sentences.en: He has lost his imposing appearance.
He’s a tall, quietly spoken, but imposing figure.
sentences.cn: 他高高的个子，说话轻声细语，但气宇轩昂。

sentences.en: I was afraid you'd simply feel we were imposing on you.
sentences.cn: 我担心你会觉得我们是在勉强你。

sentences.en: If you slap your face until it's swollen in an effort to look imposing, you'll suffer for sure.
sentences.cn: 打肿脸充胖子, 吃亏的是自己.

sentences.en: Imposing speed restrictions is easy, but forcing motorists to observe them is trickier.
sentences.cn: 限制车速容易，但强制司机遵守这些限速规定就难办多了。

sentences.en: It gave an imposing appearance to most of the wholesale houses.
sentences.cn: 这样就使许多大商店显得富丽堂皇.

sentences.en: It was a very imposing procession of pretty faces and fine clothes.
sentences.cn: 这是一支由漂亮的脸蛋和华丽的衣着组成的队伍,十分壮观.

sentences.en: Most imposing and inspiring , however, were the pines on these dizzy heights.
sentences.cn: 但是把人的心灵带到一种崇高的境界的, 却是那些“吸翠霞而夭矫”的松树.

sentences.en: Parents of either sex should beware of imposing their own tastes on their children.
sentences.cn: 父母双方都应切记不要把自己的喜好强加给孩子。

sentences.en: The castle is an imposing building.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡是一座宏伟的建筑。

sentences.en: The fortress is an imposing building.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡是一座宏伟的建筑.

sentences.en: The mountains stand tall and imposing.
Well , that'ud be imposing , too, on Tellson's.
sentences.cn: 他这不也是糟踏台 尔森 么?

trans.tran_cn: 印象深刻的，壮观的，威风的
